A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No plot and bad story  - diversity within cast used to support a political agenda with no attempt to create a character driven story. Bad attempt a creating a Female \,99%\, Fuck Trump\, Black Lives Matter\, hippy liberal reboot of battlestar galactica with \"laser swords\". Ryan Johnson created a movie  without understanding the years of backstory and universe that makes the star wars world special. Its as if he thought he was making a SW spin off not episode 8. Special effects were good but first star wars film that didn't actually have a lightsaber duel AND suggested a Jedi Master (yoda) would use force lighting (Sith ability). The disappointment far exceeded my preconceived expectations of who was Snoke\, Ray\, Fin\, etc - RJ took everything we know about the story and fucked it up - we waited two years for a Highlander 2 - if this is what we are to expect with future films please stop making them - let the fans create their own material as it is far superior to this trash
